name: Junkrat Project
description:
After my Winston Inspired overwatch project, there was a lot I wanted to change as I had learned new skills and techniques since. A big part of it was script inheritance. This would make it so when I wanted to make another character from the Overwatch universe, it would be a lot simpler. I also created a few static scripts, that can be used by multiple characters, in this instance, the explosion for Junkrat's various weapons can be translated onto other characters.

Controls
WASD: Movement

Left Shift: Throw Concussion Mine

E: Throw Trap

Left Mouse Button: Shoot grenade

Right Mouse Button: Explode Concussion mine

Q: RIPTire
